title: Supreme Court extends stay on trial of BJP chief K Annamalai over alleged hate speech
selftext:
SC bench consisting of Justices Sanjiv Khanna and Dipankar Datta stay trial against Tamil Nadu BJP president for hate speech against a Christian NGO. 

Same bench also refuses to give bail to Arvind Kejriwal and Manish Sisodia for the Delhi Liquor Policy case despite no money trail.

Same bech also dismisses petition for 100% EVM-VVPAT verification.

Earlier, a bench comprising Justices Sanjiv Khanna, M M Sundresh and Bela Trivedi also refused bail to BRS leader K Kavitha in the same Liquor Policy case despite little reliable evidence against her.
